name: Heading Home (itch)
description:
Heading Home is a 2D Story Adventure game where you play as a character named 'Dipper'. Dipper wakes up realizing he has no knowledge of what truly makes a home feel like home. Dipper soon starts to realize through a series of three levels/quests, what truly makes up a home.

Programmer:

Jason Skillman

Designers:

Character Designer: Amanda Coler

Game Designers: Amanda Coler, Darren Lussier and Taylor Manning

Content Designer / Game Writer: Amanda Coler and Taylor Manning 

Level Designer: Amanda Coler, Darren Lussier and Jason Skillman

Technical Designer: Jason Skillman

UI Designer: Darren Lussier

Composer: 

Taylor Manning

Itchios:

Amanda Coler: https://colergames.itch.io/

Darren Lussier: https://itch.io/profile/trollspawn-games

Taylor Manning: https://proxyleafproductions.itch.io/
